domain.description: Name of the domain the volume to be deployed in.

force.description: Force removal of volume even it is attached to a VM.

disk_offering.description: Name of the disk offering to be used.

shrink_ok.description: Whether to allow to shrink the volume.

display_volume.description: Whether to display the volume to the end user or not.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the volume should be deployed.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

tags.description: List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

account.description: Account the volume is related to.

vm.description: Name of the virtual machine to attach the volume to.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the volume to be deployed in.

snapshot.description: The snapshot name for the disk volume.
